A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was awful. Completely destroyed the star wars universe.  It's ok to move on to the future\, but in the process there is no need to step all over the past.  My children were so let down by this movie and seriously doubt that the franchise is salvageable at this point.  Too many plot holes\, and the tone has become completely uneven with the unnecessary jokes...it's almost as if the writer is making fun of fans that cherish and love the series so much.
